page.title: 12 SHOPPING IN FOLKESTONE
page.content: The main shopping centre in Folkes- tone is in Sandgate Road and Guildhall Street. This includes a new traffic- free pedestrian area. Most people go to large supermarkets to buy their food - Sainsbury's and Tesco are situated in the town centre, while Presto is on the outskirts of Folkestone. Other shops include clothing, shoes, toy and gift shops. The Old High Street is a steep cobbled road and is popular with tourists as it has plenty of souvenir shops. One of the main attractions is the rock shop where people can watch the rock being made. The people who shop in Folkestone are mainly local, or people from the surrounding rural areas who come to buy clothes and food. Tourists are also important customers, especially in Summer. Visitors from France and Belgium come for day trips and buy a lot of clothes.
